name: Eye Attack
description:
This is the first game I ever finished making when I was only 14 years old. It was released on the GameMaker Sandbox back in 2006 and and it got a few thousand downloads.  Unfortunately, the gamemaker sandbox  shut down years ago and some people were asking me where they could find this game, so I thought I would release it here!

The old soundtrack was just a few repetitive 6 second loops, so I decided to replace all the music in this version.  The new soundtrack is  made up of songs that I made when I was learning music composition back in  2012. These songs were mainly created for practice, but I figured that this was a great opportunity to actually release them out into the wild.

This version has a few changes from the old version:

-All new music

-A new music room where you can listen to songs from the new and classic soundtrack

-Added options to mute the music and sound effects

-Slightly changed a few  levels and boss battles  for convenience reasons

Working with my old code that I wrote when I was a teenager was a fun, yet horrifying experience! There are probably a bunch of spelling mistakes in the dialogue, but I  won't be fixing them.
